title: MY account has been permanently suspended
body: I DONT KNOW THE REASON AND  I EVEN DIDNT PLAY YESTERDAY

replies.body:
Hey there,

You should check your email, bans should always be accompanied with an email stating the reason for the ban and length of the suspension.

If you have not received an email, or are unable to locate it (Check your junk folder) then please [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support for further details on your suspension.
